are you able to upload the different "premier" files from this release so that they can be copied and overwrite the files from the regular borderlands 2?
I'm already downloading the Skidrow version, so I'm wondering, what's so special about this "Premier Club Edition". Anyone? I mean, are there any extras that come with this?

@whateverthefuck Hello brother, the premiere club edition contains a Golden key which allows you to open a secret chest somewhere in the game, a relic that gives u 5% more rare item find and 3 gold guns to start with. BUT there is absolutely no need to download this one since the skidrow version includes the premiere club edition extras aswell. Tested and confirmed
